Special Qualities: Blink, darkvision 60 ft., dimension door, low-light vision, scent
Abilities: Str 10, Dex 17, Con 10, Int 10, Wis 13, Cha 11
Skills: Hide +3, Listen +5, Sense Motive +3, Spot +5, Survival +4

Descripci\u00f3n: The blink dog is an intelligent canine that has a limited teleportation ability.Blink dogs have their own language, a mixture of barks, yaps, whines, and growls that can transmit complex information.

Combate: Blink dogs hunt in packs, teleporting in a seemingly random fashion until they surround their prey, allowing some of them to take advantage of flanking.Blink (Su): A blink dog can use blink as the spell (caster level 8th), and can evoke or end the effect as a free action.Dimension Door (Su): A blink dog can teleport, as dimension door (caster level 8th), once per round as a free action. The ability affects only the blink dog, which never appears within a solid object and can act immediately after teleporting.
